org.mmbase.applications.packaging.providerhandlers
Class BasicProvider

java.lang.Object
  org.mmbase.applications.packaging.providerhandlers.BasicProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
ProviderInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
DiskProvider, HttpProvider
public class BasicProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements ProviderInterface

BasicProvider, Basic Handler for Providers. gets packages and bundles from the provider and feeds them to the package and bundle managers.

Author:
Daniel Ockeloen (MMBased)
